name: large_capacity_knapsack_optimization
chinese_name: 浅谈 OI 中的大容量背包问题
author: 方心童
complexity: O(W^2 log W) for complete knapsack; O(n Σw_i log W) or O(n Σv_i log V) for multiple knapsack
summary: The paper discusses optimization techniques for large-capacity knapsack problems in competitive programming, focusing on reducing the effective problem size using greedy preprocessing, number theory (such as modular arithmetic and the Frobenius problem), and divide-and-conquer strategies. It presents methods to transform complete and multiple knapsack problems into smaller-scale versions independent of the large capacity M, achieving better time complexity when W or V is small.
